HediffDef.Name: PsychiChannelingAbs
HediffDef.description: Psychic energy emanates from the weapon of this person.

HediffDef.Name: PsychiProtectionTankAbs
HediffDef.description: Psychic energy emanates from this person. That energy acts like a psychic shield and allows it to take more hits than the average person.

HediffDef.Name: PsychiProtectionDodgeAbs
HediffDef.description: Psychic energy emanates from this person. That person can use this energy as a way to deflect incoming bullets or some sort of prescience power.
